snippet: The World Chess Federation has hired Andrew Paulson, an American fashion photographer turned Russian media mogul, to run some of its most prestigious tournaments.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that World Chess Federation hired Andrew Paulson, American fashion photographer turned Russian media mogul, to run some of its most prestigious tournaments.
lead_paragraph: The World Chess Federation has hired Andrew Paulson, an American fashion photographer turned Russian media mogul, to run some of its most prestigious tournaments.

headline.seo: Chess: Andrew Paulson Makes Success of Grand Prix
headline.main: Good Start for a Promoter Who Is New to the Game
headline.print_headline: Good Start for a Promoter Who Is New to the Game
